Aron (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0303: Mawile
Pokémon
#0305: Lairon →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Aron (TCG Pocket).

Aron has been featured on 25 different cards since it debuted in the EX Ruby & Sapphire expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Aron cards are normally Metal-type or Fighting-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Aron

Aron
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
